column4: Can someone please tell me how I can uninstall my ati driver?
so you mean you compiled them/??
ohh...  for unistalling follow the Readme from the source
it will have the drivers installed for you..you wont have to compile them
yeah they do have drivers for most of the card
they will install envy first and then if you select to install the drivers then your drivers maybe affected
do it from the terminal ...copy paste the command i gave you
you must have the repositories enabled...check them under System->Administration->Software sources
ok copy paste your /etc/apt/sources.list... in a terminal type gksu gedit /etc/apt/sources.list ...
sorry i did a typo!!!! :S it is envyng-gtk and envyng-core
